name: @atmtfy/elite
description: Elite Shopify 2.0 Theme. Based on Shopify's "Dawn", but with preprocessing, etc
author: Automatify

scripts.deploy: pnpm webpack -env=production && cd dist && shopify theme push
scripts.pull: cd dist && rm .shopifyignore && touch .shopifyignore && shopify theme pull
scripts.push: pnpm  webpack --env=production && cd dist && shopify theme push --unpublished --nodelete
scripts.push:new: pnpm  webpack --env=production && cd dist && rm .shopifyignore && touch .shopifyignore && shopify theme push --unpublished
scripts.push:data: cd dist && rm .shopifyignore && touch .shopifyignore && shopify theme push
scripts.update: pnpm  webpack -- --env=production && cd dist && shopify theme push --nodelete
scripts.publish: pnpm  webpack -- --env=production && cd dist && shopify theme push --publish --nodelete
